title: ACTREC Recruitment 2026 - Walk-in-Interview for Clinical Trial Coordinator Posts
description: The Advanced Centre for Treatment Research and Education in Cancer (ACTREC) has published the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for Clinical Trial Coordinator Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post Graduation, M.Pharm, can grab this chance and apply for the ACTREC Recruitment 2026 . Here, we mentioned more information about the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested ...
